headline: Is This Where AMD Begins Closing the AI Gap With Nvidia?
summary: AMD (NASDAQ:AMD) has transformed remarkably in the artificial intelligence (AI) space. Just a few years ago, the company had virtually no presence in artificial intelligence, focusing mainly on CPUs and GPUs for gaming and PCs. Under CEO Lisa Su’s leadership, Advanced Micro Devices pivoted aggressively, launching accelerators like the MI250 and MI300 series to compete ... Is This Where AMD Begins Closing the AI Gap With Nvidia?
